title.narrative: Strengthening Household Ability to Respond to Development Opportunities (SHOUHARDO) III

description.narrative: (Bangladesh): SHOUHARDO III works with targeted communities to support their food security through integrated activities designed to improve their livelihoods, health, hygiene, nutrition, and resilience, while expanding women's empowerment. The program operates in 23 sub-district in eight districts, primarily in the flood-prone areas of the northeast and northwestern parts of Bangladesh. With the FY 2020 funds, SHOUHARDO III will increase participants' incomes through improved agricultural productivity, small service related entrepreneurship and market access, access to savings and finance, training in new livelihoods, and improved linkages to private sector job opportunities. The activities will also improve the health and nutritional status of all, especially pregnant and nursing women, adolescent girls, and children under five, through education and communications, by creating a corps of community nutrition advisors who are self-supporting through sales of nutrition and hygiene products. SHOUHARDO III activities will also support disaster mitigation through the raising of house plints, building awareness for slope protection in schools, earthen mounds and embankments by planting vegetation, and training of communities. SHOUHARDO III will support the existing transformative groups as change agents for achieving gender equality and promoting early childhood care and development. It will continue enhancing the capacity of government institutions and community associations to empower the women and the vulnerable and help them to exercise their rights through active participation in development activities. This activity supports the U.S. government's objectives to provide improved quality of life opportunities and enhance the people's lives to create a healthy, self-sufficient, resilient and sustainable economy in Bangladesh which supports the country's journey to self-reliance.. .

participating-org.narrative: Cooperative for Assistance and Relief Everywhere
